about_the_game:
*THIS GAME INVOLVES BREAST AND BUTT EXPANSION, MINI GIANTESS, GAS AND OTHERS OF THE FETISH, IF YOU DON'T LIKE OR CAN'T DEAL WITH ANY OF THAT, DON'T PLAY - A WARNING.*

A 2D Platformer set in the World of the Soulstream Expansive, You play as Little Luca, Looking for answers to as why the women of the world are growing slowly! Walk, Jump, Run, Punch, and Struggle your way through multiple levels, as you avoid being crushed by Womens growing Butts and Boobs! Encounter and talk to Many Different Women during the course of your Journey! All with Different Personalities! Ride your friend Rii as you use his help to get from place to place! QTE's, Struggles and action all await you in this Quest of Growing women!

An ADVENTURE of EXPANSIVE PROPORTIONS...

In a world with a scientist finding a way for females to advance in the world and genetically become superior to males...

An accident occurs in the lab, and her research is unleashed...

It is up to little Luca to fend off the devastation that this certain virus causes, and maybe he is the last hope for men, lest us be smothered under them...

Choices will be made...

Will you bow and let the women take over, and grow to massive proportions?

Will you befriend some?

Will you fight for your normal sized world again?

This coming in the world, of the Soulstream Expansive...

FEATURES

-Fight off the Evolving Virus and Baddies

-Choose to Submit, Struggle, Or Fight

-Interact with females all growing in different ways, by different means

-Befriend or Get on the wrong side of the females you will meet

-Explore a new world where men are the weaker and smaller, and shrinking in power by the minute.

-Choices with consequences...

*REMAKE WILL BE DEVELOPED IN A NEW GAME ENGINE (UNITY)*

*THIS GAME WILL NOT BE UPDATED FURTHER, WHOLE REMAKE IS COMING SOON, AND WILL BE IN FULL 2.5D WORLD*

*This is my first foray into Game Creation, So please be kind! :D*

content_descriptors.notes:
*THIS IS A FETISH BASED GAME FOR FANS OF BREAST AND BUTT EXPANSION, MINI GIANTESS, GAS, SMOTHERING, AND ETC.* 

*There is no FULL on Nudity, but very big boobs and butts are shown throughout the game, And cleavage, and Butts popping out of jeans :P*

*PLEASE BE AWARE IT IS FOR A VERY SPECIFIC FETISH, WOMEN IN THIS GAME WILL GROW, INFLATE, AND EXPAND, DUE TO A TOXIN RELEASED IN THE AIR, THE PRIMARY FOCUS ON THIS GAME IS BUTT, AND BREAST EXPANSION, WHERE THESE WOMEN GROW LARGER ASSETS DURING GAMEPLAY! GAS IS ALSO INCLUDED ON SOME OF THE MINIGAMES AS WELL*

name: The Soulstream Expansive (Prelude)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel 7th Gen
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 2600 GTX
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Explore a World In which a Female Scientist has released a Toxin, In which all women are now inflating and becoming large by the minute! Ass Expansion, Breast Expansion, and Mini Giantess shenanigan's ensue! Play as Little Luca, and explore but be careful! You might get crushed while at it!
